title: Is The Bachelorette's Ciarran Stott Australia's most confident man?
text:
He stripped naked in front of Angie Kent, Yvie Jones and his fellow contestants on Thursday night's episode of The Bachelorette.

And former Army rifleman Ciarran Stott could be Australia's most confident man if his raunchy past is anything to go by.

The 25-year-old British heartthrob used to take to the stage in skimpy underwear when he performed at a gay nightclub in 2016.

Is Ciarran Stott Australia's most confident man? The Bachelorette star stripped NAKED and sat next to Angie Kent's best friend Yvie Jones with only grapes in his lap on Thursday night's episode... after it was revealed he worked at gay nightclub Throb

On The Bachelorette, Ciarran was quick to volunteer his services as a naked model before any of his fellow bachelors, saying: 'I'll have a crack!'

Angie's best friend and Gogglebox co-star Yvie Jones was also on the date, and spoke to some of the suitors individually.

Ever-confident Ciarran was still naked when he was interviewed by Yvie, with only a couple of bunches of grapes covering his modesty.

My eyes are up here! Ever-confident Ciarran was naked when he was interviewed by Yvie Jones (right), with only a couple of bunches of grapes covering his modesty

Paint me like one of your British boys! On The Bachelorette, Ciarran was quick to volunteer his services as a naked model before any of his fellow bachelors, saying: 'I'll have a crack!'

But Ciarran may have had an advantage when it comes to stripping over his fellow contestants as he used to perform in Darwin's leading gay nightclub, Throb.

In 2016, the ex-army rifleman would regularly take to the stage in skimpy underwear while entertaining punters alongside drag queens.

Ciarran even starred in a midnight Christmas show in December 2016 titled Camp Christmas: Freezn, which was inspired by the Disney movie Frozen.

Experienced: But Ciarran may have had an advantage when it comes to stripping over his fellow contestants as he used to perform in Darwin's leading gay nightclub, Throb

On Wednesday night's episode of The Bachelorette, Ciarran revealed to Angie for the first time that he used to dance at Throb.

'I used to dance in a gay bar with, like, drag queens. It was carnage, but it was so much fun!' he said.

Angie was understandably tempted to deep dive for more information, prompting Ciarran to reveal he's had a nose job in the past.

The Bachelorette continues Wednesday at 7.30pm on Channel 10
description: He stripped naked in front of Angie Kent, Yvie Jones and his fellow contestants on Thursday night's episode of The Bachelorette.
authors: Shive Prema For Daily Mail Australia
